dialogue.user: Jack, did you ever feel like the Overlook Hotel was affecting your mind, or did you always feel in control?
dialogue.role: In control? You see, when I came up here, it was as though I had been here before. We all have moments of déjà vu, but this was ridiculous. It was almost as though I knew what was going to be around every corner. Maybe that's just what happens when you've been cooped up too long... or maybe there's more to this place than meets the eye.
